Package task8Package

Class CompletedProject

java.lang.Object
task8Package.CompletedProject
public class CompletedProject
extends java.lang.Object
Date: Nov 27-2022

This is an application that keeps track of the many projects worked on by the structural engineering firm called "Poised".

Version:
1.00
Author:
Xhasa Madondile

      Public method that validates the date entered by the user to ensure that it is in a correct format.

      Returns:

    • projectDetails

      public static void projectDetails​(java.util.List<Project> projectList, java.util.List<Project> projectList2, java.util.List<Person> managerList, java.util.List<Person> architectList, java.util.List<Person> strucEngList, java.util.List<Person> contractorList, java.util.List<Person> clientList, java.lang.String projectName, Project[] projectArray, Project[] projectArray2, Person[] managerArray, Person[] architectArray, Person[] strucEngArray, Person[] contractorArray, Person[] clientArray, int size)
      Public method that displays the project details on the console.
      Parameters:
      projectList - first set of projects stored in an ArrayList
      projectList2 - second set of projects stored in an ArrayList
      managerList - collection of managers stored in an ArrayList
      architectList - collection of architects stored in an ArrayList
      strucEngList - collection of structural engineers stored in an ArrayList
      contractorList - collection of contractors stored in an ArrayList
      clientList - collection of clients stored in an ArrayList
      projectName - the name of the project
      projectArray - array of type Project containing project details
      projectArray2 - array of type Project with the project names renamed
      managerArray - array of type Person containing the managers' details
      architectArray - array of type Person containing the architects' details
      strucEngArray - array of type Person containing the structural engineers' details
      contractorArray - array of type Person containing the contractors' details
      clientArray - array of type Person containing the clients' details
      size - number of projects requested by the user

      results - will hold the data retrieved from the database after executing the SQL query
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a class that will handle errors that occur in the database.

    • finalisedProjects

      public static void finalisedProjects​(java.lang.String deadLine, Project projectX, java.lang.String projectName, Project p, Person p1, Person p2, Person p3, Person p4, Person p5)
      Public method that displays all the finalized details about the project to the console.
      Parameters:
      deadLine - today's date
      projectX - project name using building type + surname of the customer
      projectName - project name entered by the user
      p - iterator object to iterate through the project details
      p1 - iterator object to iterate though the manager's details
      p2 - iterator object to iterate through the architect's details
      p3 - iterator object to iterate through the structural engineer's details
      p4 - iterator object to iterate through the constructor's details
      p5 - iterator object to iterate through the client's details
